channel.title: MommyPOD
channel.description: MommyPOD is a podcast that allows all types of Moms another outside source to the world that may be a bit out of reach when home with the children. PlMommyPOD covers arts and crafts for Moms and kids, different articles of interest, digital and paper scrapbooking, websites of interest, and much MUCH more.
channel.itunes:author: Karlana Kulseth
channel.itunes:summary: MommyPOD is a podcast that allows all types of Moms another outside source to the world that may be a bit out of reach when home with the children.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Podcast for the Mom on the Go!

item.title: Episode #2: A Bit of This and That!
item.description: I will be talking about New Year resoluitions, Lunch Recipes for Kids, Books, Magazines, and more. Song "One Perfect Day" by Adrienne Pierce.
item.itunes:author: Karlana Kulseth
item.itunes:summary: I will be talking about New Year resoluitions, Lunch Recipes for Kids, Books, Magazines, and more. Song "One Perfect Day" by Adrienne Pierce.

item.title: MommyPOD's First Show!
item.description: This show will cover what MommyPOD is all about, who Karlana is, and a bit of this and that. Song played by Berman "Life in the Stars". Find Show Notes at http://mommypod.blogspot.com!
